summary: never had this kind of thing before - celaenos - Critical Role (Web Series) [Archive of Our Own]
title: never had this kind of thing before - celaenos - Critical Role (Web Series) [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Beau thinks about the look on Nott’s face—one she’s never seen on her mother’s—and she reaches into a pouch and tosses him twenty gold without really thinking about it. Instinct. Like reaching back for Caleb.

Beau (& Nott & Caleb & Jester) post ep 49.

reblog.comment:

tags: this was on the subject of how 'everything is complicated and sometimes ur exeriments just get fucked'
summary: Quote from my genetics prof that's kinda a mood but also sounds like something caduceus would say if he was having a...
body: Quote from my genetics prof that’s kinda a mood but also sounds like something caduceus would say if he was having a religious/existential crisis: “At night I lie in bed and occasionally I have visions. And in these visions i am looking out into the infinite darkness of the universe and our lack of knowledge and beyond the realm of infinity, I can see Mother Nature. And you know what shes doing? Shes sticking her middle finger up at me.”

reblog.comment: Quote from my genetics prof that’s kinda a mood but also sounds like something caduceus would say if he was having a religious/existential crisis: “At night I lie in bed and occasionally I have visions. And in these visions i am looking out into the infinite darkness of the universe and our lack of knowledge and beyond the realm of infinity, I can see Mother Nature. And you know what shes doing? Shes sticking her middle finger up at me.”

trail.content_raw: Quote from my genetics prof that’s kinda a mood but also sounds like something caduceus would say if he was having a religious/existential crisis: “At night I lie in bed and occasionally I have visions. And in these visions i am looking out into the infinite darkness of the universe and our lack of knowledge and beyond the realm of infinity, I can see Mother Nature. And you know what shes doing? Shes sticking her middle finger up at me.”

And in these visions i am looking out into the infinite darkness of the universe and our lack of knowledge and beyond the realm of infinity, I can see Mother Nature. And you know what shes doing? Shes sticking her middle finger up at me.”

summary: Two Moons - Chapter 1 - Koshmar - Critical Role (Web Series) [Archive of Our Own]
title: Two Moons - Chapter 1 - Koshmar - Critical Role (Web Series) [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
“From how I have come to understand it, some people have soulmates Caleb. They come to our lives in some way or another, but during moments, special moments, sometimes the gods will give us a gift, to show the world the bond the two of you share together.”

—

Enjoy my first fan fiction, I am equally terrified and excited to see where this will go.

Also editing is a bitch.

reblog.comment:

blog.name: crtranscript
blog.title: Critical Role Transcript
blog.description: A #Critter project to add captions to every episode of Critical Role.

title: Official Lyrics: Mighty Nein Intro
body:
We all know that the Critical Role Mighty Nein animated intro is amazing. Here are the official lyrics!

🎵

(Role! Critical! Role! Critical!)
The adventure begins
They were always beside you
Your nerdy best friends
And the DM to guide you

And they rise from the flames for the battles ahead
Villains beware cuz you’re ‘bout to be dead

They got magic and flair
They got falchions and cunning
They don’t see over there
There’s a monster incoming

Inspiration is waiting rise up don’t think twice
Put your fate in your hands take a chance roll the dice

(Role! Critical! Role! Critical!)

Can you answer the call
Diggin’ deep in your soul
As the legend unfolds
Now it’s your turn to roll

🎵

summary: Looking for players in Storm King’s Thunder
title: Looking for players in Storm King’s Thunder
body:
hey friends, i’m looking for new people to join a party for Storm King’s Thunder, we’ve only had one session and not a lot happened, due to scheduling conflicts we’re down to only three people in the party and I would like to have more.

I’m new to DMing and I would like to get at least one or two more kindhearted, understanding, players so if you would like to join in, send myself or @papi-azucar a message with 

name;

age;

preferred pronouns;

character concept;


we like to play thursday nights around 8pm EST

blog.name: criticalnope
blog.title: critical nope
blog.description: a critical role dedicated tumblr - because we all rolled nat20 at suffering - also kinda a dnd blog

question: 5, 12 & 21 for the ask meme
answer:
Thanks for asking !

5. keyleth or beauregard? Marisha delivered two really interesting (and widely different) characters, and even if i like both, i relate more to Beau for lots of reasons. 

12. kima or keg? The two smalls gays eh ? Even if I LOVED Ashly Burch and Keg, i still have to pick, and i’ll pick Kima

21. the campaign one cosplay intro or the campaign two animated intro? Campaign Two animated intro. The song, the animation…it’s perfect.

Ask me stuff !

reblog.comment:
Thanks for asking !
